questions.text: Which of the following statements BEST explains why Copernicus's sun-centered model of the Universe is considered a superior theory to Ptolomey's

answerChoices.text: Copernicus's model can predict the location of planets without needing to assume that planets move in circles within circles.
Ptolomey's model is incapable of predicting the location of planets each night.

questions.text: The statement 'A theory is a good theory if it fits observed data' is an INCOMPLETE statement. What is missing?

answerChoices.text: A theory should make the predictions while making the minimum number of base assumptions.
